'''Hyperblooming Circus''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Elemental Specialist: Series II]]''. The achievements are earned by defeating 4 enemies with [[Hyperbloom]].

==Achievements==
{{Achievements by Category Table|Hyperblooming Circus}}
<!--
==Notes==
-->
==Trivia==
* The achievement's name is a reference to the "{{w|Itano Circus}}," a style of action scene developed by the Japanese animator {{W|Ichirō Itano}}, which depicts excessive volleys of missiles being fired simultaneously by giant robots in aerial combat.
